main event: A civilian family observed a round sphere of white light while returning home from a drive on July 16, 1952.
interesting points: The object was initially seen traveling west to east and then changed direction to travel north., The family observed the object for a total of 10 to 15 seconds before it made its first disappearance., After about 5 seconds of being out of sight, the object reappeared and was visible for an additional 5 to 10 seconds., The object exhibited no visible means of propulsion., The sighting was reported to the Air Force for further investigation.
